meanings.definition: Cold cuts of meat typically used for sandwiches.
meanings.sent1: I made a sandwich with delicious lunchmeats.
meanings.sent2: My mom packed some lunchmeats for my school lunch.
meanings.sent3: The lunchmeats in my sandwich started a dance party in my lunchbox.
meanings.sent4: The variety of lunchmeats in the deli case was a colorful rainbow of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly sliced lunchmeats filled the kitchen with a tempting scent.

meanings.sent1: The grocery store had a great selection of lunchmeats.
meanings.sent2: We bought some turkey lunchmeats for our picnic.
meanings.sent3: The lunchmeats in the fridge were having a secret meeting about being eaten.
meanings.sent4: The lunchmeats on the platter looked like a beautiful mosaic of meat slices.
meanings.sent5: The lunchmeats on the sandwich were so tasty, they made my taste buds do a happy dance.
